items.sentence: You'd better give up smoking for your health.
You'd better not wake me up when you come in.
All the stories Tom told us were interesting.
Tom convinced his daughter not to marry John.
Tom wasn't first one to turn in his homework.
Tom will apparently be in Boston this winter.
Tom won't be invited to the opening ceremony.
At last, I graduated from junior high school.
Taking out a knife, he tried to open the can.
The priceless china shattered into fragments.
